duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide anesthesia care for surgical, obstetrical, and trauma patients.
Monitor and manage patient vitals and anesthesia levels during surgery.
Collaborate with the surgical team to ensure patient safety and comfort throughout procedures.
Administer medications as necessary and manage anesthesia-related complications.
Maintain accurate patient records and documentation related to anesthesia care.
Participate in patient assessments and pre-anesthesia evaluations.
Stay informed about advancements in anesthesiology and adapt practices accordingly.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Nursing with a focus on Anesthesiology
